title: My Loot Page Just Reset
body: The client tried to restart a few times and now everything in my loot page is gone, all essence all gems, everything. I have tried to restart and it is all still missing. Any thoughts?

replies.body: Oh, that's unsettling!  Usually, this happens if your connection has a hiccup and lost connection to hextech.  Glad to hear everything looks okay now!
Everything just came back, bug I guess.
